sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
  Form,
  ProgressBar,
  Button,
  Card,
  InputGroup,
  FormControl
} from "react-bootstrap";
const num = 25;

const PostProject = () => {
  const [progress, setProgress] = useState(num);
  return (
    <Card className="w-75 mx-auto my-5 p-4">
      <Form>
        <ProgressBar now={progress} className="mb-4" />
        <InputGroup className="mb-3">
          <InputGroup.Prepend>
            <InputGroup.Text id="basic-addon1">Project Title</InputGroup.Text>
          </InputGroup.Prepend>
          <FormControl
            placeholder="example: 'Marketing Strategy'"
            aria-label="Title"
            aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
          />
        </InputGroup>

        <InputGroup className="my-4" style={{ height: "200px" }}>
          <InputGroup.Prepend>
            <InputGroup.Text>Description</InputGroup.Text>
          </InputGroup.Prepend>
          <FormControl
            as="textarea"
            aria-label="With textarea"
            placeholder="Write a short description about your project..."
          />
        </InputGroup>
        <Button variant="primary" type="submit">
          Submit
        </Button>
      </Form>
    </Card>
  );
};

export default PostProject;
